conversations.body_text:
When will I get this package 


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

Are u guys fucking with me nothing works no product shipping information you guys said I have a ticket click on it no fucking ticket give me my fucking refund


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

Hi William Diaz-Santiago,    We sincerely apologize—it appears the courier may have misplaced this package. We have urgently shipped a replacement order from our U.S. warehouse and expect it to arrive by the 15th.  https://www.fedex.com/wtrk/track/?trknbr=395244345739
